attributes.action: Tremough campus is for University of Cornwall,end Exeter University annexation
attributes.additional_details: Main lobby group is the Univesrity of Cornwall Support Group who won the EU backing in the first place
attributes.background: Tremough funded by EU Objective One poverty funds for standalone University of Cornwall. Exeter University admit amongst lowest deprived background students in UK and hardly any from the Cornish community, They refuse to cede campus to a Cornish University and have annexed our University
